Original: 非常熱愛足球跟很有個性的老闆，如果你熱愛歐洲足球來這邊就對了。餐飲的部分，建議點一般的酒類，如台啤/Stella啤酒等，個人不愛調酒系列。炸薯條$200，新鮮好吃😋。老闆對於足球相當的了解，可以聊的很開心。老闆很可愛有趣，也有即時注意到每位客人的需求，看到比賽精采處，就會音量很大的回應或歡呼，也喜愛跟著客人看足球賽，因此觀賞球賽的氣氛相當好。室內遵照法規從2023/1開始就不開放抽菸👍。室外走廊可吸菸。如果吸菸區可以離門口遠一點就更完美了😍。酒吧可以刷卡。
EN: I love football with a very personality boss. If you love European football here.For the catering part, it is recommended to order ordinary alcoholic alcohol, such as Taiwan Beer/Stella Beer, and individuals do not like bartending series.French fries $ 200, fresh and delicious.The boss understands the football very well, and you can talk very well.The boss is very cute and interesting. He also immediately noticed the needs of each guest. When you see the brilliant place in the game, you will have a great response or cheer. He also likes to watch the football game with the guests. Therefore, the atmosphere of the viewing game is quite good.The indoor compliance with regulations has not been opened to smoke from 2023/1.Outdoor corridors can smoke.If the smoking area can be a little bit away from the door, it will be more perfect.The bar can swipe the card.

Original:
結論：附近這一帶看球的最佳去處，餐點及調酒普通但以運動酒吧來說算Ok了。

環境及服務：座位不算多，但每個位置都有不錯的看球角度，老闆本身就很愛看球，滿滿的看球氛圍。有重要賽事的時候要記得訂位，不然可能沒位置坐。整體看球環境算舒適，服務個人覺得以運動酒吧來說算是不錯了。

調酒：個人覺得普普通通，不過來運動酒吧調酒功力本就是其次，覺得還在可以接受的範圍內

餐點：主要就是一些炸物，選擇算多了，炸得算是不差囉
EN:
Conclusion: The best place to watch the ball in the nearby area. The meal and bartending are ordinary but the sports bar is OK.

Environment and service: There are not many seats, but each position has a good viewing angle. The boss himself loves watching the ball and is full of the ball atmosphere.Remember to reservations when you have important events, otherwise you may not have a place.The overall watching environment is comfortable, and the service personally feels that it is good for sports bars.

Bart -up: Personally feel ordinary, but the skill of bartending in the sports bar is the second, and I feel that it is still within the acceptable range.

Meal: Mainly some fried objects. There are too many choices.

Original:
如果你是新客人，講話需要用悄悄話的音量，不然老闆會說：我這邊這麼安靜，都是你們的聲音，本來想趕你們走

不過熟客進來後，老闆跟熟客大聲喧鬧是沒有關係的喔

這是一家新客與熟客地位不同的運動酒吧
===

回應業主的回覆：
會訂這家是因為朋友推薦，說是非常適合看世足，因此前往看球賽

我們認知運動酒吧既然是轉播比賽的，大家應該是可以用在一般酒吧的音量聊天

如果需要客人用悄悄話的方式聊天，應該在我們訂位時就告知，當天也可以先來告知我們，請我們降低音量

而老闆做法是把電視的音量開到會讓耳朵刺耳的那種大聲，然後我們去點酒，順便反應是否可以把電視音量小聲一點時，直接爆氣，用非常大聲的方式說：「本來想要趕你們走，沒看到我們這邊這麼安靜，就你們在講話」

而在老闆爆氣的當下，我們至少道歉了4-5 次，並且還是完成了點單與付錢的動作，我們自認沒有不禮貌的地方

同時也因為老闆的說法，我們開始討論這裡的音量可能不能太大，看球如果也不能太吵的話，是不是要換個地方

在我們搜尋新酒吧時，老闆的熟客來了，老闆跟熟客用比我們剛剛還要大聲的方式在寒暄與聊天，會讓我們有點搞不清楚，關於吵鬧的定義，是不是有點雙標？

最後我們離開了這家酒吧，過程中我們沒有跟老闆惡言相向，甚至被老闆大聲罵的當下，我們也是感到非常抱歉的說了好幾次對不起，因此到底是誰沒禮貌呢？

最後想說老闆這家店是你的，你開心怎麼經營都好，但如果有規定可以訂位時提早說，甚至可以先來提醒我們，而不是突然就爆氣，而且雙標，自己可以很大聲講話，但客人都不行
EN:
If you are a new guest, you need to use a whisper volume to speak, otherwise the boss will say: I am so quiet, it is your voice, I originally wanted to catch you

However, after mature customers come in, the boss has nothing to do with the loud noise of the cooked guest.

This is a sports bar with a different status of new customers and mature customers
===

Respond to the owner's reply:
I will book this one because of the recommendation of a friend, saying that it is very suitable for watching the world, so go to watch the ball game

Since we are aware that the sports bar is a broadcast competition, everyone should be able to use the volume chat in ordinary bars

If the guests need to chat in a whisper, we should inform us when we order. You can also tell us on the same day. Please reduce the volume

And the boss's approach is to drive the volume of the TV to the loud loud that will make the ears harsh. Then we will order a drink. By the way, whether the TV volume can be whispered, it will explode directly and say "I wanted to think about it. If you want to drive you away, you haven't seen us so quiet, just speak ""

At the moment when the boss was explosive, we apologized at least 4-5 times, and we still completed the action of ordering and paying. We believe that there is no impolite place.

At the same time, because of the boss's statement, we start to discuss the volume here may not be too large. If you can't be too noisy to watch the ball, do you want to change the place?

When we searched a new bar, the boss's mature guest came. The boss and the cooked passenger used the way we just had a loud manner than us, and it would make us a bit unclear. Is it a bit of a dual standard about the definition of noisy?

In the end, we left this bar. In the process, we did not talk badly with the boss, and even being scolded by the boss, we felt very sorry for several times, so who is rude?

Finally, I want to say that the boss is your shop. You are happy to operate well, but if you have regulations, you can say early when you order, or even remind us first, instead of suddenly bursting. Speak loud, but the guests can't do it

我們都在這裡說「乾杯」！

As a foreigner, I have been very popular. Now I am a frequent visitor to this place. This is a good place to participate in sports events.I don't like football or baseball teams, but I still go there just to see people cheer, of course, and my Guinness black beer.
People are very friendly. It doesn't matter whether they are employees or customers, foreigners or locals.
We all say "toast" here!
